title: The lively oracles given to us, or, The Christians birth-right and duty, in the custody and use of the Holy Scripture by the author of The whole duty of man, &c.
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
notes: Authorship of The whole duty of man is attributed to Richard Allestree. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Attributed also to Robert Boyle, Lady Pakington, Bishop Fell, etc.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
